Descriptive analysis of best case and worst case for sector profile

Source: vignettes/articles/descriptive-analysis-best_case_worst_case_sector_profile.Rmd
descriptive-analysis-best_case_worst_case_sector_profile.Rmd

This article shows how to calculate the descriptive analysis of equal weight, best case, and worst case for sector profile.

Example company-level output of transition risk profile for best case and worst case of sector profile 

transition_risk_product_example <- example_transition_risk_company_sector_avg_best_case_worst_case()
kable(transition_risk_product_example)
companies_id country scenario year sector_target_avg_equal_weight sector_target_avg_best_case sector_target_avg_worst_case
comp_1 france 1.5C RPS 2030 0.25 0.25 0.25
comp_1 france NZ 2050 2030 0.85 0.85 0.85
comp_2 france 1.5C RPS 2030 0.10 0.10 0.10
comp_2 france NZ 2050 2030 0.30 0.30 0.30
comp_3 austria 1.5C RPS 2030 0.35 0.35 0.35
comp_3 austria NZ 2050 2030 0.55 0.55 0.55
comp_4 austria 1.5C RPS 2030 0.70 0.70 0.70
comp_4 austria NZ 2050 2030 0.20 0.20 0.20

Descriptive analysis of sector_target_avg_equal_weight per scenario-year benchmark 

sector_target_avg_per_benchmark <- function(data, col) {
  data |>
    select(all_of(c("companies_id", "scenario", "year", col))) |>
    distinct() |>
    mutate(scenario_year = paste(.data$scenario, .data$year, sep = "_")) |>
    select(-c("scenario", "year")) |>
    mutate(sum_mode = sum(.data[[col]], na.rm = TRUE), .by = "scenario_year") |>
    mutate(distinct_comp = n_distinct(companies_id, na.rm = TRUE), .by = "scenario_year") |>
    mutate(average = sum_mode / distinct_comp) |>
    mutate(rank_median = median(.data[[col]], na.rm = TRUE), .by = "scenario_year") |>
    mutate(rank_25th = quantile(.data[[col]], 0.25, na.rm = TRUE), .by = "scenario_year") |>
    mutate(rank_75th = quantile(.data[[col]], 0.75, na.rm = TRUE), .by = "scenario_year") |>
    select(-all_of(c("sum_mode", col, "companies_id", "distinct_comp"))) |>
    distinct()
}
sector_target_avg_equal_weight_per_benchmark <- sector_target_avg_per_benchmark(transition_risk_product_example, "sector_target_avg_equal_weight") |>
  rename("average_sector_target_avg_equal_weight" = "average",
         "median_sector_target_avg_equal_weight" = "rank_median",
         "25th_quantile_sector_target_avg_equal_weight" = "rank_25th",
         "75th_quantile_sector_target_avg_equal_weight" = "rank_75th")

kable(sector_target_avg_equal_weight_per_benchmark)
scenario_year average_sector_target_avg_equal_weight median_sector_target_avg_equal_weight 25th_quantile_sector_target_avg_equal_weight 75th_quantile_sector_target_avg_equal_weight
1.5C RPS_2030 0.350 0.300 0.2125 0.4375
NZ 2050_2030 0.475 0.425 0.2750 0.6250

Descriptive analysis of sector_target_avg_best_case per scenario-year benchmark 

sector_target_avg_best_case_per_benchmark <- sector_target_avg_per_benchmark(transition_risk_product_example, "sector_target_avg_best_case") |>
  rename("average_sector_target_avg_best_case" = "average",
         "median_sector_target_avg_best_case" = "rank_median",
         "25th_quantile_sector_target_avg_best_case" = "rank_25th",
         "75th_quantile_sector_target_avg_best_case" = "rank_75th")

kable(sector_target_avg_best_case_per_benchmark)
scenario_year average_sector_target_avg_best_case median_sector_target_avg_best_case 25th_quantile_sector_target_avg_best_case 75th_quantile_sector_target_avg_best_case
1.5C RPS_2030 0.350 0.300 0.2125 0.4375
NZ 2050_2030 0.475 0.425 0.2750 0.6250

Descriptive analysis of sector_target_avg_worst_case per scenario-year benchmark 

sector_target_avg_worst_case_per_benchmark <- sector_target_avg_per_benchmark(transition_risk_product_example, "sector_target_avg_worst_case") |>
  rename("average_sector_target_avg_worst_case" = "average",
         "median_sector_target_avg_worst_case" = "rank_median",
         "25th_quantile_sector_target_avg_worst_case" = "rank_25th",
         "75th_quantile_sector_target_avg_worst_case" = "rank_75th")

kable(sector_target_avg_worst_case_per_benchmark)
scenario_year average_sector_target_avg_worst_case median_sector_target_avg_worst_case 25th_quantile_sector_target_avg_worst_case 75th_quantile_sector_target_avg_worst_case
1.5C RPS_2030 0.350 0.300 0.2125 0.4375
NZ 2050_2030 0.475 0.425 0.2750 0.6250

Descriptive analysis of sector_target_avg_equal_weight per scenario-year benchmark for a country 

sector_target_avg_per_benchmark_country <- function(data, col, country_value) {
  data |>
    select(all_of(c("companies_id", "scenario", "year", "country", col))) |>
    distinct() |>
    mutate(scenario_year = paste(.data$scenario, .data$year, sep = "_")) |>
    select(-c("scenario", "year")) |>
    filter(country == country_value) |>
    mutate(sum_mode = sum(.data[[col]], na.rm = TRUE), .by = "scenario_year") |>
    mutate(distinct_comp = n_distinct(companies_id, na.rm = TRUE), .by = "scenario_year") |>
    mutate(average = sum_mode / distinct_comp) |>
    mutate(rank_median = median(.data[[col]], na.rm = TRUE), .by = "scenario_year") |>
    mutate(rank_25th = quantile(.data[[col]], 0.25, na.rm = TRUE), .by = "scenario_year") |>
    mutate(rank_75th = quantile(.data[[col]], 0.75, na.rm = TRUE), .by = "scenario_year") |>
    select(-all_of(c("sum_mode", col, "companies_id", "distinct_comp"))) |>
    distinct()
}
sector_target_avg_equal_weight_per_benchmark_country <- sector_target_avg_per_benchmark_country(transition_risk_product_example, "sector_target_avg_equal_weight", "france") |>
  rename("average_sector_target_avg_equal_weight" = "average",
         "median_sector_target_avg_equal_weight" = "rank_median",
         "25th_quantile_sector_target_avg_equal_weight" = "rank_25th",
         "75th_quantile_sector_target_avg_equal_weight" = "rank_75th")

kable(sector_target_avg_equal_weight_per_benchmark_country)
country scenario_year average_sector_target_avg_equal_weight median_sector_target_avg_equal_weight 25th_quantile_sector_target_avg_equal_weight 75th_quantile_sector_target_avg_equal_weight
france 1.5C RPS_2030 0.175 0.175 0.1375 0.2125
france NZ 2050_2030 0.575 0.575 0.4375 0.7125

Descriptive analysis of sector_target_avg_best_case per scenario-year benchmark for a country 

sector_target_avg_best_case_per_benchmark_country <- sector_target_avg_per_benchmark_country(transition_risk_product_example, "sector_target_avg_best_case", "france") |>
  rename("average_sector_target_avg_best_case" = "average",
         "median_sector_target_avg_best_case" = "rank_median",
         "25th_quantile_sector_target_avg_best_case" = "rank_25th",
         "75th_quantile_sector_target_avg_best_case" = "rank_75th")

Descriptive analysis of sector_target_avg_worst_case per scenario-year benchmark for a country 

sector_target_avg_worst_case_per_benchmark_country <- sector_target_avg_per_benchmark_country(transition_risk_product_example, "sector_target_avg_worst_case", "france") |>
  rename("average_sector_target_avg_worst_case" = "average",
         "median_sector_target_avg_worst_case" = "rank_median",
         "25th_quantile_sector_target_avg_worst_case" = "rank_25th",
         "75th_quantile_sector_target_avg_worst_case" = "rank_75th")
